Organic Cottage Cheese

Organic Cottage Cheese

Dairy Products Category

Description

Enjoy the wholesome goodness of our Organic Cottage Cheese, carefully crafted from the milk of grass-fed cows raised on certified organic farms. This cottage cheese not only boasts a deliciously creamy texture and a gentle, tangy flavor but also represents our commitment to sustainable dairy farming. The cows providing the milk for our cottage cheese graze on pesticide-free pastures, ensuring the milk is as pure and nutritious as possible. By choosing our cottage cheese, you`re supporting farming practices that prioritize animal welfare and environmental health. Perfect as a nutritious snack, a versatile ingredient in recipes, or a protein-rich addition to your meals, our Organic Cottage Cheese is a testament to the taste and benefits of choosing organic.

Specifications

  • Weight: 16 oz per container
  • Size: Medium container, fits in most refrigerator doors
  • Packaging: Recyclable plastic container
  • Nutritional Information: Rich in protein, calcium, and essential vitamins

Benefits

  • Versatile Diet Addition

    Free from artificial additives, for a clean, wholesome taste.

  • Environmentally Friendly

    Produced using sustainable organic farming.

  • High Protein Content

    Supports muscle repair and growth.
